typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		age as short,
		sex as boolean,
		cp as short,
		trestbps as short,
		chol as short,
		fbs as boolean,
		restecg as short,
		thalach as short,
		exang as boolean,
		oldpeak as double,
		slope as short,
		ca as short,
		thal as short,
		target as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> HeartSource
HeartSource aggregate(groupBy(age),
	{cholestrol } = avg(chol)) ~> CalcAvgAge
CalcAvgAge sort(asc(age, true)) ~> SortByAge
SortByAge sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> OutputtoStorage
